titleStmt.title: Gods statute for generall iudgement by the man Christ Iesus. Opened in a sermon at the funerall of the most religious lady, the Lady Lucie Iervoice, sometime wife to the right worshipfull Sir Thomas Iervoice at Herriot. Aug. 26. 1641. By John Brokett Minister of Elsfeild.
titleStmt.author: Brokett, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. L. for Richard Thraule at the signe of the Crosse-Keyes, at the entrance into Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crosse-Keyes, at the entrance into Pauls Church-yard
